sense.def:
One's youth
je obdobje v življenju, ko smo še otroci, preden postanemo odrasli.

seg.quote: We change and learn from youth to old age.
He had visited Calcutta in his youth.

sense.def:
Youth
je lastnost ali stanje nekoga, ki je mlad in morda nezrel ali neizkušen.

seg.quote: ...marvelling at his freshness and apparent youth.

sense.def:
A youth
je fant ali mlad moški, zlasti najstnik.

The youth
so mladi ljudje, mišljeni kot celota.

seg.quote: ...unemployment among the youth of this country.
